code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Tree Detection"
        PLR[Groupware_IssueTracker] --> SCAN[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
        SCAN --> LOGS[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        LOGS --> CLUSTER[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
        CLUSTER --> BASE[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        BASE --> CHECK{Groupware_KanbanBoard}
        CHECK -->|No| ADD[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        CHECK -->|Yes| SKIP[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        ADD --> TREES[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    end
    
    subgraph "Tree Cutting Process"
        REQ[Groupware_WikiPage] --> LLM[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        LLM --> COORD[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        COORD --> MOVE[Groupware_WikiPage]
        MOVE --> START[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        
        START --> HEIGHT[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        HEIGHT --> FINDLOGS[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        FINDLOGS --> HASLOG{Groupware_KanbanBoard}
        
        HASLOG -->|Yes| CUT[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        HASLOG -->|No| NEXTH[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        
        CUT --> EFFECTS[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        EFFECTS --> WOOD[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        WOOD --> MORE{Groupware_KanbanBoard}
        
        MORE -->|Yes| HEIGHT
        MORE -->|No| NEXTH
        
        NEXTH --> MAXH{Groupware_SprintBacklog}
        MAXH -->|No| HEIGHT
        MAXH -->|Yes| DONE[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        
        DONE --> MARK[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        MARK --> COMPLETE[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    end
    
    subgraph "Cut Tree Registry"
        MARK --> REGISTRY[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
        REGISTRY --> KEY[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        KEY --> PERSIST[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        PERSIST --> PREVENT[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    end
    
    style SCAN fill:#e8f5e8
    style CUT fill:#ffebee
    style EFFECTS fill:#fff3e0
    style REGISTRY fill:#f3e5f5
repo_description: Intelligent Agentic NPCs for Minecraft with LLM Integration
